mapper.select: SELECT login_info_table.uAccount, login_info_table.uName, login_info_table.uTel, login_info_table.organization_name, login_info_table.headerImageUrl, GROUP_CONCAT( authority_table.authority_key ORDER BY authority_table.authority_key SEPARATOR ',' ) AS authority_key, department_table.department_name FROM login_info_table INNER JOIN user_authority_table ON user_authority_table.uAccount = login_info_table.uAccount INNER JOIN authority_table ON authority_table.authority_code = user_authority_table.authority_code INNER JOIN department_table ON department_table.uAccount=login_info_table.uAccount WHERE login_info_table.uAccount = #{account} and login_info_table.uPasswordEncode=#{pass} GROUP BY login_info_table.uAccount, login_info_table.uName, login_info_table.uTel, login_info_table.organization_name, login_info_table.headerImageUrl, department_table.department_name;
